Essar Energy plc bụ ụlọ ọrụ ike India nke dị na obodo Mauritius nke nwere akụ na azụmaahịa ike na mmanụ na gas
N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na obodo Port Louis, ya na Obodo Mauritius na enyemaka nke ndi Essar Group, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere mmasị na mmepụta ike na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, onye nwere ọtụtụ òkè, Essar Global Fund Limited, nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.

E guzobere ya na afo 1998 dịka ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa zuru oke nke ụlọ ọrụ Essar Group, a na-ebugharị azụmaahịa ahụ na London Stock Exchange n'ọnwa Epre no’ l afọ 2010, na-egosi na mgbanwe ahụ bụ nke kachasị ukwuu kemgbe Disemba no’ afọ 2007. A gbakwunyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na FTSE 100 Index na nyocha nke nkeji iri na ise sochirinụ
Essar Global Fund Limited jidere ihe dịka 76 pacenti na Essar Energy. Ndị na-eduga na ntinye aka mbụ nke ọha na eze bụ JPMorgan Chase ya na Deutsche Bank
Ravi Ruia, Onye isi oche, ya na Sanjay Mehta, onye isi oche nke Essar Global Limited, ka a chọpụtara na akụkọ Economic Times of India dịka ihe enyemaka na ndepụta ahụ.
